extensionDescription.message: Enhance marketing productivity with centralized task management, rich text notes, and YouTube integration.

navTasks.description: Label for the navigation tab or section for tasks.

navNotes.description: Label for the navigation tab or section for notes.

navYouTube.description: Label for the navigation tab or section for YouTube videos.

navSettings.description: Label for the navigation tab or section for settings.

addTaskButton.description: Label for the button to add a new task.

taskTitlePlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the task title input field.

taskDescriptionPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the task description input field.

taskDueDateLabel.description: Label for the task due date input field.

markTaskCompleteButton.description: Label for the button to mark a task as complete.

editTaskButton.description: Label for the button to edit an existing task.

deleteTaskButton.description: Label for the button to delete a task.

addSubtaskButton.description: Label for the button to add a subtask.

taskDetailsLabel.description: Heading or label for a section displaying task details.

newNoteButton.description: Label for the button to create a new note.

saveNoteButton.description: Label for the button to save a note.

editNoteButton.description: Label for the button to edit an existing note.

deleteNoteButton.description: Label for the button to delete a note.

noteTitlePlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the note title input field.

notesPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the notes rich text editor.

addYouTubeVideo.description: Label for the button to add a YouTube video.

youtubeLinkPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the YouTube link input field.

settingsPageTitle.description: Title for the extension settings page.

themeLabel.description: Label for the theme selection setting.

defaultViewLabel.description: Label for the setting to choose the default view/tab on extension open.

saveSettingsButton.description: Label for the button to save user settings.

taskAddedSuccess.description: Notification message when a task is successfully added.

taskCompleteSuccess.description: Notification message when a task is successfully marked complete.

taskDeletedSuccess.description: Notification message when a task is successfully deleted.

noteSavedSuccess.description: Notification message when a note is successfully saved.

noteDeletedSuccess.description: Notification message when a note is successfully deleted.

videoAddedSuccess.description: Notification message when a YouTube video is successfully added/embedded.

settingsSavedSuccess.description: Notification message when settings are successfully saved.

loadingMessage.description: Generic message indicating content is loading.

genericErrorMessage.message: An error occurred. Please try again.
genericErrorMessage.description: Generic error message for various failures.

invalidYouTubeLinkError.message: Invalid YouTube link. Please enter a valid URL.
invalidYouTubeLinkError.description: Error message for an invalid YouTube link input.
